Question: Who can enroll the customer
Answers: 1. Retail FR (FRR) can enroll to BRO Customers.
2. UKU FR (FRW) can enroll to UKU Mechanics.
3. JMR can enroll to Bosch Extra mechanics.
4. SWS BP can enroll to NW customers.

Question: Which type of customers can enrolled from Mobile application
Answers: Below type of customers can enrolled via Mobile App: Retailer, Car Garage, CV Garage, NW, IW, UKU, Bosch Extra Mechanic.

Question: What are the conditions are applicable in Enrollment
Answers: 1. Same Mobile No. can not be enrollment with Same BMD Channel if one UID already is in Active status
2. Blocked by HO customers not considered for condition
3. Retailer can be enrolled with any type of BMD like - BMD SAC, BMD CV, BMD PC, RBIC, BBD
4. CV Garage , NW, UKU Mechanic can be enrolled under BMD SAC & BMD CV
5. Car Garage, IW, Bosch Extra Mechanic can be enrolled in der BMD PC
6. Authorized Workshop flow from eFocus, or Area Manager can send details in define format to techsupport.

Question: How Enrollment cycle works_BRO Customer
Answers: 1. FR/BP SWS BP Logins to Bosch Infocom Mobile Application.
2. Submit Enrollment with all Necessary details
3. BMD Login to Mobile Application and approve the enrollment (Customer Code Generated)
4. BMD upload the NEFT details - If NEFT already submitted for same Mobile No. then same will be auto clubbed
5. Area Manager will approve the Enrollment
6. Agency will verify the enrollment
7. Channel Manager will approve the enrollment.

Question: How Enrollment cycle works_UKU Mechanic
Answers: 1. FR -UKU Logins to Bosch Infocom Mobile Application.
2. Submit Enrollment with all Necessary details.
3. BMD Login to Mobile Application and approve the enrollment (Customer Code Generated).
4. Zonal Manager will approve the Enrollment.

Question: How Enrollment cycle works_Bosch Extra Mechanic Mechanic
Answers: 1. JMR Logins to Bosch Infocom Mobile Application
2. Submit Enrollment with all Necessary details
3. JM Login to Mobile Application and approve the enrollment
4. Channel Manager will approve the Enrollment

Question: What is the process of Copy Customer
Answers: 1. Copy customer option applicable for all unauthorized customers
2. FR will login to Mobile app and enter the Mobile No. which is already enrolled in Programed
3. Block customer can not copy by entering Mobile No
4. Customer can copy with same Customer channel
5. Same Mobile No. can not be copy in same BMD Channel as One BMD Channel = one UID
6. All Information will Copy other than Geo Code
7. Approval process will remain same as per New enrollment

Question: Where can I find the current Enrollment Status
Answers: 1. User can refer the Single Customer Information Report available under Master Menu
